explains: v. 通过立法实施；制定法律，立法

sentences.en: They promised to legislate to protect people's right to privacy.
sentences.cn: 他们承诺立法保护公民的隐私权。

sentences.en: The government will legislate against discrimination in the workplace.
sentences.cn: 政府将制定法律，在工作场所禁止歧视。

sentences.en: The law cannot legislate filial responsibility any more than it can legislate love.
sentences.cn: 法律不能给爱情制定法律，更不能为子女的义务而立法。
